original: @329a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @329a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: brahma pu tr'i sva ra sa tyee sto tre na siddham w'a ka pra bha n'a ma /
analyzed: brahma pu tr'i sva ra sa tyee sto tre na siddham w'a ka pra bha n'a ma /
translated: Brahmaputrīsarasvatīstotreṇa siddhaṃ vāka prabhā nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa dag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa dag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba /
translated: The Praise of Sarasvatī, Daughter of Brahmā, which is the Accomplishment of Light Rays🔽

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Mañjuśrī.🔽

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang zhal gyi mche ba'i rtse las mngon sprul zhing //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang zhal gyi mche ba'i rtse las mngon sprul zhing //
translated: Manifesting from the tip of the fangs of Avalokiteśvara,🔽

original: thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pha rol rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul mtha' yas pha rol rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
translated: The infinite emanations of compassion are for the sake of guiding those who are to be tamed.🔽

original: tshangs pa'i bu mo mdzes ma khyod sku gsal ba'i rnam 'gyur can //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i bu mo mdzes ma khyod sku gsal ba'i rnam 'gyur can //
translated: “Beautiful daughter of Brahmā, you have a radiant appearance.

original: bishnu'i gzugs can tambu ra la dga' bskyed tshul 'dzin ma //
analyzed: bishnu'i gzugs can tambu ra la dga' bskyed tshul 'dzin ma //
translated: He is Tambura, who delights in the form of Vishnu.🔽

original: @329b rjes su chags bcas rol pa'i lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i nyams //
analyzed: @329b rjes su chags bcas rol pa'i lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i nyams //
translated: The sixteen years of his passion and play are now gone.🔽

original: chu gter 'gram ngogs lbu ba'i phreng bas rtse bar dga' ba can //
analyzed: chu gter 'gram ngogs lbu ba'i phreng bas rtse bar dga' ba can //
translated: The ocean's shore is delightful with garlands of foam.🔽

original: dri za'i bu mo mngon bstod nyid kyi rnam thar phul byung rnams //
analyzed: dri za'i bu mo mngon bstod nyid kyi rnam thar phul byung rnams //
translated: The biography of the gandharva maiden Abhayadākinī.🔽🔽

original: gang gis yid la dran byed de la ngag gi dbang phyug stsol //🔽kho bos khyod dran ba spu shas cher g-yo ba'i lag pa gnyis //
analyzed: gang gis yid la dran byed de la ngag gi dbang phyug stsol // kho bos khyod dran ba spu shas cher g-yo ba'i lag pa gnyis //
translated: I offer you a garland of well-formed verses,🔽not fully realizing your qualities in their entirety,🔽but merely a little bit,🔽with two hands that tremble with the hairs standing on end,

original: thal sbyar me tog gzhon nu kha 'bus lta bu spyi bo'i steng //
analyzed: thal sbyar me tog gzhon nu kha 'bus lta bu spyi bo'i steng //
translated: placing them on my head like a blossoming flower,

original: rab bzhag snying nas rab tu gus pa lhur byed khyod kyi yon tan ni //🔽mtha' dag rtogs min cung zang rnyed 'di sdeb legs phreng bas mchod //
analyzed: rab bzhag snying nas rab tu gus pa lhur byed khyod kyi yon tan ni // mtha' dag rtogs min cung zang rnyed 'di sdeb legs phreng bas mchod //
translated: with the utmost respect from my heart.

original: khyod sku 'o ma'i mtsho 'dra kunda ku mud zla zer mtshungs //
analyzed: khyod sku 'o ma'i mtsho 'dra kunda ku mud zla zer mtshungs //
translated: Your body is like a sea of milk, like a jasmine flower, like the rays of the moon,

original: rab dkar 'od kyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba'i gzi brjid kyis //
analyzed: rab dkar 'od kyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba'i gzi brjid kyis //
translated: completely surrounded by a garland of light,

original: lha dbang yid 'phrog dga' ba'i nga ros khyod la rtag tu bstod byed na //
analyzed: lha dbang yid 'phrog dga' ba'i nga ros khyod la rtag tu bstod byed na //
translated: with a splendor that always praises you with the delightful cries of the captivating celestial maidens,

original: blo gros don gsal don gnyer lha la gus pa smos ci dgos //
analyzed: blo gros don gsal don gnyer lha la gus pa smos ci dgos //
translated: what need is there to mention those who are devoted to the gods, seeking the clear meaning with intelligence?

original: chu skyes dkar po dri med steng gnas ge sar g-yo ba'i rtser //
analyzed: chu skyes dkar po dri med steng gnas ge sar g-yo ba'i rtser //
translated: On the trembling tip of the pistil of a stainless white lotus,

original: ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdan steng tsog pu'i tshul bzhugs bgying bag can //
analyzed: ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdan steng tsog pu'i tshul bzhugs bgying bag can //
translated: Seated in the posture of a rabbit catcher, with a slightly bent body.🔽With one face, two hands, and the sound of a Gandharva's lute,

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dri za'i pi wang bsgrengs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang // rjes mthun gsung gis sa gsum skye dgu'i bsam pa tshim mdzad ma //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dri za'i pi wang bsgrengs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang // rjes mthun gsung gis sa gsum skye dgu'i bsam pa tshim mdzad ma //
translated: Satisfying the thoughts of all beings in the three worlds with appropriate speech.

original: 'jam mnyen 'khril zhing ring ba bung ba lta bur gnag pa'i skra //
analyzed: 'jam mnyen 'khril zhing ring ba bung ba lta bur gnag pa'i skra //
translated: Hair soft, smooth, and long, dark like a bee,

original: g-yas g-yon rgyab tu 'phyang zhing cung zad li ba'i thor cog la //
analyzed: g-yas g-yon rgyab tu 'phyang zhing cung zad li ba'i thor cog la //
translated: Hanging to the right, left, and back, slightly curly.

original: me tog dkar po'i phreng bas thod bcings spyi gtsug zla bas spud //
analyzed: me tog dkar po'i phreng bas thod bcings spyi gtsug zla bas spud //
translated: A white flower garland binding the topknot, the crown adorned with a moon.

original: gser gyi rna cha 'phyang zhing mkhur tshos mdzes pa 'dzum pa'i zhal //
analyzed: gser gyi rna cha 'phyang zhing mkhur tshos mdzes pa 'dzum pa'i zhal //
translated: Hanging golden earrings, beautiful cheeks, a smiling face.

original: ka tsa linda'i smad g-yogs tshom bu'i spras pas sgeg pa'i nyams //🔽punda r'i ka'i phreng ba chun 'phyang mgul rgyan do shal can //
analyzed: ka tsa linda'i smad g-yogs tshom bu'i spras pas sgeg pa'i nyams // punda r'i ka'i phreng ba chun 'phyang mgul rgyan do shal can //
translated: A lower garment of Kācalindi cloth, with a pattern of squares, having a graceful appearance.🔽A garland of punnāga flowers, with hanging tassels, a necklace, and a locket.

original: phyag zhabs rin chen phreng ba sil sil sgra ldan brgyus pa yis //
analyzed: phyag zhabs rin chen phreng ba sil sil sgra ldan brgyus pa yis //
translated: Hands and feet strung with jeweled garlands, tinkling with sound.

original: khyed sku lha dang rig 'dzin bu mo'i tshogs kun ngo mtshar gyur //
analyzed: khyed sku lha dang rig 'dzin bu mo'i tshogs kun ngo mtshar gyur //
translated: You are the body of the gods and the host of knowledge-holding maidens.

original: lha mo gzhon sgeg lang tshor ldan pa skye dgu'i yid 'phrog ma //
analyzed: lha mo gzhon sgeg lang tshor ldan pa skye dgu'i yid 'phrog ma //
translated: You are the youthful goddess, endowed with beauty, captivating the minds of all.

original: yid 'ong 'dzum pa'i bzhin can mig dkyus ring po'i zur gyis ni //
analyzed: yid 'ong 'dzum pa'i bzhin can mig dkyus ring po'i zur gyis ni //
translated: With a face of charming smiles, and sidelong glances of long eyes,

original: smin ma g-yo ba'i gar can khyod sku rtag tu dran byed la //
analyzed: smin ma g-yo ba'i gar can khyod sku rtag tu dran byed la //
translated: With eyebrows dancing, I constantly remember your body.

original: rab tu dgyes pa'i nyams kyis gzigs shing kho bo rjes su bzung //
analyzed: rab tu dgyes pa'i nyams kyis gzigs shing kho bo rjes su bzung //
translated: Looking with a very joyful expression, you accepted me.

original: mdzad spyod bags kyis dal zhing gsong por smra ba'i ngang tshul can //
analyzed: mdzad spyod bags kyis dal zhing gsong por smra ba'i ngang tshul can //
translated: With a nature of gradual, slow conduct, and speaking frankly,

original: m'a li sar @330a * //
analyzed: m'a li sar @330a * //
translated: You are the one who gives the breast,🔽Smelling of jasmine,

original: pa'i dri ldan nu zho nu bar 'dod pa la //
analyzed: pa'i dri ldan nu zho nu bar 'dod pa la //
translated: To the child who desires to drink milk.

original: reg pas dga' ba'i nu zho stob byed khyed la rtag tu bstod pa'i bu //
analyzed: reg pas dga' ba'i nu zho stob byed khyed la rtag tu bstod pa'i bu //
translated: I am the child who always praises you, the one who gives the breast of joy through contact.

original: snying nas yus che shas cher du ba'i gdung ba tshim mdzad ma //
analyzed: snying nas yus che shas cher du ba'i gdung ba tshim mdzad ma //
translated: You are the one who satisfies the longing of the heart with great pride.

original: de yi yid la bstod pa'i zol tshig ca cor ma nges pa yi sgra //
analyzed: de yi yid la bstod pa'i zol tshig ca cor ma nges pa yi sgra //
translated: The sound of her mind, uncertain about the meaningless words of praise,

original: smra ba'i ga zhas 'dir spel nyid kyi thugs la bas gyur mod //
analyzed: smra ba'i ga zhas 'dir spel nyid kyi thugs la bas gyur mod //
translated: I have written this in order to increase my own understanding.🔽

original: 'on kyang kho bo'i blo ni 'dir zad bu yi nyes pa rnams //
analyzed: 'on kyang kho bo'i blo ni 'dir zad bu yi nyes pa rnams //
translated: I have been guilty of this fault, I know, in composing this treatise.🔽But mothers forgive the faults of their children;

original: ma yis bzod mdzad brtse bas slar yang bu ni rab tu skyongs //
analyzed: ma yis bzod mdzad brtse bas slar yang bu ni rab tu skyongs //
translated: with love they cherish them again.

original: snying gi chu skyes 'dab brgyad dkar po ze'u 'bru'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: snying gi chu skyes 'dab brgyad dkar po ze'u 'bru'i phreng ba can //
translated: In the center of my heart is an eight-petaled white lotus,

original: dmar ser mdzes pa'i mtshams nas 'od kyi dra ba rab tu dgye //
analyzed: dmar ser mdzes pa'i mtshams nas 'od kyi dra ba rab tu dgye //
translated: with a ring of stamens, from which red and yellow rays of light stream forth.

original: ge sar 'jam pa'i rtse mor bsil zer can ni rab gnas pa'i //
analyzed: ge sar 'jam pa'i rtse mor bsil zer can ni rab gnas pa'i //
translated: Upon its soft pistil is the moon,

original: dbus su chu shel mdog 'dzin hr'im gi phreng bas sgrib gnyis 'joms //
analyzed: dbus su chu shel mdog 'dzin hr'im gi phreng bas sgrib gnyis 'joms //
translated: and in its center is a syllable hrīḥ, the color of crystal, which destroys the two obscurations.

original: 'dab ma re rer gnyis gnyis bzhugs pa'i aa a'a la sogs dbyangs yig rnams //
analyzed: 'dab ma re rer gnyis gnyis bzhugs pa'i aa a'a la sogs dbyangs yig rnams //
translated: On each of the petals are two vowels, a, ā, and so on,

original: g-yas su bskor ba'i rim pas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba ltar //🔽kun nas 'od zer 'phro ba'i rgyan ldan rtse mo'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: g-yas su bskor ba'i rim pas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba ltar // kun nas 'od zer 'phro ba'i rgyan ldan rtse mo'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: arranged in a clockwise circle, like a garland of blazing lamps.🔽From them light radiates in all directions,

original: yid kyi dri ma mun nag rnam bsal blo gros mchog stsol mdzod //
analyzed: yid kyi dri ma mun nag rnam bsal blo gros mchog stsol mdzod //
translated: and the nature of the tips of these lights is to dispel the darkness of mental stains and to bestow the highest wisdom.

original: srog gi 'od zer skra yi khyod tsam phra ba'i cha shas kyis //
analyzed: srog gi 'od zer skra yi khyod tsam phra ba'i cha shas kyis //
translated: The light rays of life, as fine as a hair, with parts

original: rtsol ba'i sgo nas myur bar lha mo'i thugs la reg gyur pas //
analyzed: rtsol ba'i sgo nas myur bar lha mo'i thugs la reg gyur pas //
translated: By the door of effort, quickly touching the mind of the goddess,

original: 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bas rnam pa bdun pa'i mchod sprin can //
analyzed: 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bas rnam pa bdun pa'i mchod sprin can //
translated: Turning the second wheel, with the cloud of the seven branches,

original: 'jug pa'i rlung zhon rang sems ye shes rgyas mdzad de la 'dud //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rlung zhon rang sems ye shes rgyas mdzad de la 'dud //
translated: Riding the wind of entry, I bow to you, the one who expands the wisdom of my mind.

original: de rjes hr'im gi phreng ba mu tig do shal mgal me yi //
analyzed: de rjes hr'im gi phreng ba mu tig do shal mgal me yi //
translated: After that, a garland of hrims, like a pearl necklace or firebrand,

original: 'khor ba'i tshul du 'khor ba zhal gyis go nas 'thon gyur cing //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i tshul du 'khor ba zhal gyis go nas 'thon gyur cing //
translated: Circling in the manner of a wheel, entering through the mouth,

original: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas zhugs slar yang sa bon tsha zer rtser //
analyzed: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas zhugs slar yang sa bon tsha zer rtser //
translated: Entering the mandala at the navel, again on the tip of the seed,

original: 'bar ba'i mod la dbyangs can ngag ster khyod zhabs spyi bos blang //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i mod la dbyangs can ngag ster khyod zhabs spyi bos blang //
translated: The instant it blazes, I place my head at the feet of you, Sarasvatī, giver of speech.

original: lha mo gtsang spra la dga' brdzun spangs 'byung po'i zas dor zhing //
analyzed: lha mo gtsang spra la dga' brdzun spangs 'byung po'i zas dor zhing //
translated: The goddess, who delights in purity, abandons lies, and discards the food of spirits,

original: tshangs spyod brtul zhugs can gyis nyin re dran byas yum bos na //
analyzed: tshangs spyod brtul zhugs can gyis nyin re dran byas yum bos na //
translated: The one who is disciplined and virtuous, having been called mother by the daily remembrance,

original: slar yang dag gi dbang phyug ci bzhed gsungs pa'i gad mo yis //
analyzed: slar yang dag gi dbang phyug ci bzhed gsungs pa'i gad mo yis //
translated: And again, with a laugh, you ask, “What does the Lord of Truth desire?”

original: dkar gsum zas kyi dga' ston tshul gyis dngos grub stsol la 'dud //
analyzed: dkar gsum zas kyi dga' ston tshul gyis dngos grub stsol la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you who grant spiritual powers in the manner of a feast of the three white foods.

original: de ltar khyod bstod lhur len gang yin de ni yon tan gyis //
analyzed: de ltar khyod bstod lhur len gang yin de ni yon tan gyis //
translated: Whatever I am doing, intent on praising you, by the power of that🔽and by the power of the truth of the nature of reality,

original: dbul gyur sna tshogs rigs pa'i gzhung lugs rnams las nges pa'i don //
analyzed: dbul gyur sna tshogs rigs pa'i gzhung lugs rnams las nges pa'i don //
translated: may I quickly understand the definitive meaning from the various scriptural traditions

original: myur @330b rtogs sa gsum skye bo'i gzhung sgron gti mug mun pa rnams //
analyzed: myur @330b rtogs sa gsum skye bo'i gzhung sgron gti mug mun pa rnams //
translated: and dispel the darkness of ignorance of the three worlds,🔽and may I attain the state of the Lord of Conquerors, Amitabha.

original: rab bsal rgyal ba'i dbang po 'od dpag med 'dra thob par shog /'dir ni 'phags dang mkhas pa'i skye bo phul byung chogs rnams ston //
analyzed: rab bsal rgyal ba'i dbang po 'od dpag med 'dra thob par shog /'dir ni 'phags dang mkhas pa'i skye bo phul byung chogs rnams ston //
translated: Here, I present the excellent assembly of noble and learned beings,

original: bdag 'dra khums shing mu cor sgrogs pa dang tshul mi shes mod //
analyzed: bdag 'dra khums shing mu cor sgrogs pa dang tshul mi shes mod //
translated: and though I am timid and do not know the proper way,

original: khyod kyi rjes zhugs lan cig ma yin tshig don goms bya'i phyir //
analyzed: khyod kyi rjes zhugs lan cig ma yin tshig don goms bya'i phyir //
translated: having entered your path, I am familiar with the words and meanings again and again.

original: sdeb sbyor gtsor byas brag ca'i sgra mtshungs 'di ni bstod par rigs //
analyzed: sdeb sbyor gtsor byas brag ca'i sgra mtshungs 'di ni bstod par rigs //
translated: This praise, which is like an echo, is appropriate, with its emphasis on meter.

original: tshig 'di gang gis mthong ngam thos sam rtag tu dran byed dam //
analyzed: tshig 'di gang gis mthong ngam thos sam rtag tu dran byed dam //
translated: Whoever sees, hears, or constantly remembers these words,

original: klog dang kha don byed dang bsam don chub byed pa //
analyzed: klog dang kha don byed dang bsam don chub byed pa //
translated: Recites, recites aloud, contemplates, or masters their meaning,

original: yi ger bri'am gzhan la rgya cher rab tu ston kyang rung //🔽de yi sems dang ngag la dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can myur 'jug shog / tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa ngag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba //
analyzed: yi ger bri'am gzhan la rgya cher rab tu ston kyang rung // de yi sems dang ngag la dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can myur 'jug shog / tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa ngag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba //
translated: Writes them down, or teaches them extensively to others,🔽May the glorious goddess Sarasvatī swiftly enter their mind and speech.

original: lha mo nyid kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i bram ze phur bus mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: lha mo nyid kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i bram ze phur bus mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Light Rays of Speech Siddhi Praise to the Daughter of Brahma, Goddess Sarasvati, composed by the Brahmin Angirasa, is complete.

original: // / sum pa lo ts'a ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / sum pa lo ts'a ba dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: Translated by the Tibetan translator Dar ma yon tan.
